kubejs.ponder.tag.corrupted_pixie.descri: A stepping stone for making Aureal Essence
kubejs.ponder.tag.arcane_obelisk.descrip: Youre gate to infinite Arcane Dust
kubejs.ponder.corrupted_pixie.header: Converting Corrupted Pixies into Corrupted Pixie Jars...!
kubejs.ponder.corrupted_pixie.text_2: Rightclick it with a Corrupted Pixie, and Boom. You got yourself a Corrupted Pixie Jar
kubejs.ponder.corrupted_pixie.text_3: You can now mine it for the Corrupted Pixie Jar Item!
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus.text_2: This is a tutorial on how you can build it.
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus.text_3: Start by placing blocks of §9Arcane §9Chiseled Polished Darkstone §ron the highlighted spots
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus.text_4: Then, surround the center block with §9Chiseled Arcane Polished §9Darkstone
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus.text_5: To finish the first layer, surround all blocks with §9Polished Darkstone
kubejs.ponder.hephaestus.text_6: Finally, place a §9Smithing Table §rin the middle...
kubejs.ponder.menril.text_1: Replace all Enriched Menril Logs with normal Menril Logs
kubejs.ponder.menril.text_2: Finally place a Arboreal Extractor directly on the center trunk
kubejs.ponder.obelisk.header: Farming Arcane Crystals from Arcane Crystal Obilisks
kubejs.ponder.obelisk.text_1: First, place an Arcane Polished Darkstone Block.
kubejs.ponder.obelisk.text_2: Then, place two Arcane Crystal Blocks above it.
kubejs.ponder.obelisk.text_3: This is the Arcane Crystal Obelisk Multiblock
kubejs.ponder.obelisk.text_4: Rightclick it with a Mundabitur Dust to assemble it (This can also be done with deployers)
kubejs.ponder.obelisk.text_5: You can now mine it for the obelisk item!
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_1: This is the Arcane Space Time Construct (ASTC)
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_10: To finish, you need to throw 6 Singularities from AE2 onto it. And if that is met, it will transform into a Orb of flight
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_2: It needs a bunch of inworld processes to get converted to a Flying Orb!
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_3: Firstly, lets Strike it by lightning!
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_4: Lightning will set the ASTC 1 Phase ahead. Keep in mind, does the clock on the ASTC run out it will destroy itself.
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_5: Next we shall Light a Disruptive TNT next to it.
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_7: Now you need to place the ASTC on a Black Hole made by throwing Dark Matter and Corrupti Dust together on the ground.
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_8: Now Immerse the ASTC with Liquid Space Time!
kubejs.ponder.our_amogus_scene.text_9: Now were at stage 4! It's Cashout time!
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_1: This is the Source Time Crystal!
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_10: The Easiest way to Cheese the Time Crystal would just be to shoot all of the spells in the list at it, keep in mind though that The Crystal has a small cooldown, before it can accept more spells.
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_11: Now for the Nerdier Explanation: The Time Crystal takes 5 random entries out of this array: "hex","light","gravity","ignite","cold_snap", "intangible","freeze","crush","grow","firework". The 5 Spells are Defined by the following. It oversimplified does a 50/50 Split on the Possible Spell array, and then makes that its internal Spell Goal array. Each spell, no matter the correct matching internal spells will only increment the Time Crystals Stage by 1. Thats basically it. Dont overstress it, just fire spells at it :)
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_2: Now ensues a Text Driven Explanation on how to do it (cause animating it is seriously too hard)!
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_3: But before that. These are Spell Turrets, they will be used to automate the Time Crystal.
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_4: Rightclicking with a spell scroll inscribed at a Scribe's table will set the Spell for the turret.
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_5: A redstone pulse will activate the turret, and fire the specified Spell. I'm too lazy to animate it
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_6: To get back to the original Point though, heres how the Time Crystal works. First Ill explain it simply, and then afterwards with Code for the nerds.
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_7: The Time Crystal Spawns with a set of Spells it Desires
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_8: These Spells can only be in the range of these spells: "hex","light","gravity","ignite","cold_snap", "intangible","freeze","crush","grow","firework"
kubejs.ponder.our_third_scene.text_9: Everytime You Shoot a Spell the Time Crystal, it checks if The Spell Contains one of the Desired Spells, and then Ticks that off its internal list. Are all spells completed, it will convert to ancient debris!
